tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE insurance_claims_data (
  claim_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  policy_id INT,
  claim_date DATE,
  claim_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
  claim_status VARCHAR(20),
  claim_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE insurance_claims (
    claim_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    policy_number VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    claim_amount DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    claim_date DATE NOT NULL,
    claim_status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE claimants (
    claimant_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    claimant_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    claimant_age INT NOT NULL,
    claimant_address VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL,
    claimant_phone VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE investigations (
    investigation_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    claim_id UUID REFERENCES insurance_claims(claim_id),
    investigator_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    investigation_notes TEXT,
    fraud_detection_score DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE insurance_policy (
    policy_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    policy_number VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    policy_holder_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    policy_start_date DATE NOT NULL,
    policy_end_date DATE NOT NULL,
    premium_amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE claim (
    claim_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    policy_id UUID NOT NULL,
    claim_date DATE NOT NULL,
    claim_amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    claim_description TEXT,
    status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE claim_history (
    claim_history_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    claim_id UUID NOT NULL,
    status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    update_date DATE NOT NULL,
    update_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE fraud_detection (
    detection_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    claim_id UUID NOT NULL,
    detection_result TEXT,
    detector_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    detection_date DATE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE insurance_claims (
	claim_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	policy_number INT,
	claim_date DATE,
	claim_amount DECIMAL(10,2),
	claim_type VARCHAR(50),
	fraud_flag BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE policy_holders (
	policy_holder_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	policy_holder_name VARCHAR(100),
	policy_holder_address VARCHAR(255),
	policy_start_date DATE,
	policy_end_date DATE
);
